Name: Glen Innes and District Historical Society Inc

About.Hours & facilities:
MUSEUM: Open Mon-Fri 10am - 12 noon and 1pm - 4pm. Weekends 1pm -Â  4pm; Long weekends and Public Holidays 9am - 4pm. Closed Good Friday, Anzac Day morning, Christmas Eve & Christmas Day. 


ARCHIVES: Usually available 9am to 12 noon weekdays, but please check first. Other times by appointment only.

About.Access: Access only when accompanied by research assistant; phone, fax, write or email for an appointment.

About.Acquisition focus: Any material pertaining to the former Glen Innes Municipal and Severn Shire Districts (now Glen Innes Severn Council area) of an historic nature.

About.Major holdings: Glen Innes & Historical Society Inc and Glen Innes Examiner, hard copies to 2000.

Contact.Street address: 'Land of the Beardies' History House Museum, West Avenue and Ferguson Street, Glen Innes 2370
